backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with hotel, room, booking, payment, user profile, and invite token types plus storage maps and initial state for the backend canister.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic removing data linked to a deprecated hotel ID and returning a filtered actor state after upgrade.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Provides the HTML shell with root div and loads the main React entry point.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Provides a detailed pre-release regression checklist covering auth, booking flows, hotel management, payments, and activation gating.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Template and examples for release notes documenting changes, verification steps, and rollback plans for multiple versions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, routing, authentication gates, and app layout for all pages.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the static build version string.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays an admin bookings table with loading, error, and detail views using fetched booking and hotel data.
frontend/src/components/admin/CaffeineDe: Shows an informational alert about a known deploy UI issue on the Caffeine platform.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Provides admin tools to remove legacy room photos and payment methods via actor calls with UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Lets admins view and modify hotel activation and subscription status with real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Admin UI for generating invite tokens tied to hotel principals, validating input, and listing existing tokens with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/PrincipalP: Provides a confirmation-based interface for admins to purge all data for a given hotel principal after validating the ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays role-based access denial messaging and offers navigation or hotel activation steps when required.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Shows an error screen when permission checks fail and allows retrying or returning home.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: UI for validating and consuming invite tokens to activate a hotel account, with query invalidation and redirect after success.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate that prompts authenticated users without a profile to complete required details before accessing content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that ensures users are authenticated via Internet Identity before rendering children, otherwise prompts login.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards children by checking user role, admin bypass, and optional hotel activation, showing loaders or error/denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing detailed booking info including dates, guests, rooms, price, and optional guest principal with copy support.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a booking with date validation, price calculation, and submission via createBooking, displaying success on completion.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a status badge with variant and label based on a booking's status.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Displays user's bookings with hotel names, details dialog, and cancellation flow plus loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog to display a large preview of an image with title and close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Diagnostic panel showing authentication, principal, role, admin status, and hotel profile state for debugging.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays a hotel's bookings with actions to confirm or cancel bookings, handling loading, errors, and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Lets hotels add or remove payment methods, updating the profile and refetching data with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Provides a form for editing hotel profile details and contact info, with loading states and update submissions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Shows a placeholder panel indicating stay-recording functionality is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photos with fallback handling for failed images and supports both full and compact layouts.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creation and editing of rooms, including image uploads, form validation, and room list interactions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription status with badges, alerts, and optional admin contact card depending on payment and activation state.
Wraps the app with top navigation, main content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Provides a simple locale selector limited to English using a dropdown UI.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Renders the main navigation bar with links, authentication controls, and conditional admin/hotel area access.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription only.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and contact options if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user roles, profiles, tokens, and admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Custom hook for uploading images by converting them to data URLs with progress tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Provides a locale context for storing and updating the app's language preference.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user account status, roles, hotel activation, and invite token tools with refresh capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard aggregating panels for invites, hotels, bookings, purging, and system notices.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists available hotels with images and navigation, including fallback behavior for image load errors.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Guest dashboard offering access to bookings and account status with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Renders the hotel management dashboard with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription, handling loading and profile access errors.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays public hotel details, rooms, photos, and booking form, fetching data by hotelId and handling loading and missing hotel states.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Provides the main portal selection page for guests and hotel users, showing options based on authentication, role, and hotel activation state.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Shows the user's bookings table and provides shortcuts to browse hotels or view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces and enums matching backend types for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, and queries.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Enables debug mode based on development environment or a URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency formatting utilities and supported currency metadata.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Utilities for validating, filtering, and tracking hotel room picture URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements for principal‑ID data purging, re‑registration flow, and related admin and safety features.
